poem:
Title: In Land of Ancient Tears 

Acres of despair,
so much pain in the olive grove—
Biden speaks, a rusted hinge in the relentless dawn.
Oh agony of the ceaseless clock,
Hamas, in your fist, the dove trembles.
In the cold chambers, man turns beast,
a cruel feast of power unwound.
Palestine, your name, a grieving song
sung by the UN's weary mouth.
